gearTalents.name: Combined Arms
gearTalents.description: Shooting an enemy increases total skill damage by 25% for 3s.

gearTalents.name: Energize
gearTalents.description: Using an armor kit grants +1 skill tier for 15s. If already at skill tier 6, grants overcharge.

gearTalents.name: Tech support
gearTalents.description: Skill kills increase total skill damage by 25% for 20s.

gearTalents.name: Calculated
gearTalents.description: Kills from cover reduce skill cooldowns by 10%.

gearTalents.name: Shock and Awe
gearTalents.description: Applying a status effect to an enemy increases total skill damage and repair by 20% for 20s.

gearTalents.name: Safeguard
gearTalents.description: While at full armor, increases total skill repair by 100%.

gearTalents.name: Overclock
gearTalents.description: You and allies within 7m of your deployed skills, gain +25% reload speed and reduces active cooldowns by 0.2s each second.

gearTalents.name: Bloodsucker
gearTalents.description: Killing an enemy adds and refreshes a stack of +10% bonus armor for 10s. Max stack is 10.

gearTalents.name: Leadership
gearTalents.description: Performing a cover to cover grants 12% of your armor as bonus armor to you and all allies for 10s. This is doubled if you end within 10m of an enemy. Cooldown: 10s.

gearTalents.name: Protector
gearTalents.description: When your shield is damaged, you gain +5% and all other allies gain +15% of your armor as bonus armor for 3s. Cooldown: 3s.

gearTalents.name: Vigilance
gearTalents.description: Increases total weapon damage by 25%. Taking damage disables this buff for 4s.

gearTalents.name: Versatile
gearTalents.description: Amplifies total weapon damage for 10s when swapping between your primary and secondary weapons if they are different. 35% to enemies within 15m for Shotguns and SMGs. 35% to enemies further than 25m for Rifles and Marksman Rifles. 10% to enemies between 15-25m for LMGs and Assault Rifles. At most once per 5s per weapon type.

gearTalents.name: Opportunistic
gearTalents.description: Enemies you hit with shotguns and marksman rifles amplifies the damage they take by 10% from all sources for 5s.

gearTalents.name: Unstoppable Force
gearTalents.description: Killing an enemy increases total weapon damage by 5% for 15s. Stacks up to 5 times.

gearTalents.name: Companion
gearTalents.description: While you are within 5m of an ally or skill, total weapon damage is increased by 15%.

gearTalents.name: Composure
gearTalents.description: While in cover, increases total weapon damage by 15%.

gearTalents.name: Concussion
gearTalents.description: Headshots increase total weapon damage by 10% for 1.5s. 5s with marksman rifles. Headshot kills additionally increase total weapon damage by 15% for 10s.

gearTalents.name: Creeping Death
gearTalents.description: When you apply a status effect, it is also applied to all enemies within 5m of your target. Cooldown: 20s

gearTalents.name: Wicked
gearTalents.description: Applying a status effect increases total weapon damage by 18% for 20s.

gearTalents.name: Galvanize
gearTalents.description: Applying a Blind, Ensnare, Confuse, or Shock to an enemy grants 40% of your armor as bonus armor to you and all allies within 20m of that enemy for 10s.

gearTalents.name: Clutch
gearTalents.description: If you are below 15% armor, critical hits repair 3% missing armor. Kills allow you to repair up to 100% armor for 4-10s, based on your [Weapon] core attribute.

gearTalents.name: Tag Team
gearTalents.description: The last enemy you have damaged with a skill is marked. Dealing weapon damage to that enemy consumes the mark to reduce active cooldowns by 4s.

gearTalents.name: Kinetic Momentum
gearTalents.description: When in combat, each skill generates a stack while active or not on cooldown. Stacks increase your total skill damage by 1% and total skill repair by 2%. Up to 15 stacks per skill. Lost when on cooldown.

gearTalents.name: Skilled
gearTalents.description: Skill kills have a 25% chance to reset skill cooldowns. If no skills were on cooldown, you instead gain one-time buff that immediately refreshes a skill's cooldown when it goes on cooldown.

gearTalents.name: Spotter
gearTalents.description: Amplifies total weapon and skill damage by 15% to pulsed enemies.

gearTalents.name: Explosive Delivery
gearTalents.description: Whenever you throw a skill, 1.5 seconds after landing, it creates an explosion damaging enemies within 5m. Damage scales with skill tier dealing 25-100% damage of a concussion grenade. At most once per skill. Remote Pulse, All Turrets, All Hives, Explosive Seeker, Cluster Seeker, Mender Seeker, Decoy, All Traps.

gearTalents.name: Empathic Resolve
gearTalents.description: Repairing an ally, increases their total weapon and skill damage by 3-15% for 10s. 1-7% if self. Effectiveness increased by your skill tier.

gearTalents.name: Overwatch
gearTalents.description: After staying in cover for 10s, increase your and all allies' total weapon and skill damage by 12% as long as you remain in cover or in a cover-to-cover move.

gearTalents.name: Intimidate
gearTalents.description: While you have bonus armor, amplifies total weapon damage by 35% to enemies within 10m.

gearTalents.name: Unbreakable
gearTalents.description: When your armor is depleted, repair 95% of your armor. Cooldown: 60s.

gearTalents.name: Vanguard
gearTalents.description: Deploying a shield makes it invulnerable for 5s and grants 45% of your armor as bonus armor to all other allies for 20s. Cooldown: 25s

gearTalents.name: Protected Reload
gearTalents.description: Grants +20% bonus armor while reloading. Grants 0-18% of your armor as bonus armor to all other allies when they are reloading, based on your [defense] core attribute.

gearTalents.name: Glass Cannon
gearTalents.description: All damage you deal is amplified by 25%. All damage you take is amplified by 50%.

gearTalents.name: Gunslinger
gearTalents.description: Weapon swapping increases total weapon damage by 20% for 5s. This buff is lost for 5s if you weapon swap while it is active.

gearTalents.name: Focus
gearTalents.description: Increases total weapon damage by 5% every second you are aiming while scoped 8x or higher, up to 50%.

gearTalents.name: Braced
gearTalents.description: While in cover weapon handling is increased by +45%.

gearTalents.name: Spark
gearTalents.description: Damaging an enemy with a skill increases total weapon damage by 15% for 15s.

gearTalents.name: Obliterate
gearTalents.description: Critical hits increase total weapon damage by 1% for 5s. Stacks up to 15 times.
